code: import axios from"axios";import{appConstants}from"../constants/constant";export var putApplication=function putApplication(apply,success,failure){var putApplicationPromise=axios.put("".concat(appConstants.API,"/applications"),apply).then(function(res){res.data.success?typeof success==='function'&&success():typeof failure==='function'&&failure();return res;}).catch(function(err){typeof failure==='function'&&failure(err);return err;});return{type:appConstants.PUT_APPLICATION,payload:putApplicationPromise};};export var getApplication=function getApplication(user_id){var getApplicationPromise=axios.get("".concat(appConstants.API,"/applications/").concat(user_id),{withCredentials:true});return{type:appConstants.GET_APPLICATION,payload:getApplicationPromise};};export var putApplication2=function putApplication2(uid,roomnum,success,failure){var putApplication2Promise=axios.put("".concat(appConstants.API,"/applications/add/").concat(uid,"/").concat(roomnum)).then(function(res){res.data.success?typeof success==='function'&&success():typeof failure==='function'&&failure();return res;}).catch(function(err){typeof failure==='function'&&failure(err);return err;});return{type:appConstants.PUT_APPLICATION2,payload:putApplication2Promise};};export var putApplication3=function putApplication3(id,success,failure){var putApplication3Promise=axios.put("".concat(appConstants.API,"/applications/remove/").concat(id)).then(function(res){res.data.success?typeof success==='function'&&success():typeof failure==='function'&&failure();return res;}).catch(function(err){typeof failure==='function'&&failure(err);return err;});return{type:appConstants.PUT_APPLICATION3,payload:putApplication3Promise};};
